question: At {name}'s house, there are {mult} times as many {food1}s as {food2}s. He has a total of {n} {food2}s in his house. {name} bought {m} more {food2}s at the store and {k} fewer {food1}s than the number of {food2}s. Find the combined total of the number of {food1}s and {food2}s {name} has in the house?
